text: Les Vallées-de-la-Vanne is a commune in the Yonne department of central France. The municipality was made on 1 January 2016 by merger of communes of Theil-sur-Vanne, Chigy and Vareilles.Arrêté préfectoral 15 December 2015 ==References== Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Yonne
title: Les Vallées-de-la-Vanne
